professionalExperience.name: PROD DIGITAL AGENCY LTDA - Software Developer
professionalExperience.description: As a Software Developer and Email Marketing Analyst, I helped to develop, manage, and execute marketing strategies for clients, earning two promotions and actively participating in meetings to present results and align strategies with stakeholders. In software development, I collaborated closely with systems analysts and programmers to resolve issues, enhance capabilities, and apply security measures, ensuring robust, high-performing systems using established design patterns. I analyzed user needs, reviewed project requirements, and coordinated testing throughout the development lifecycle while modifying software to fix errors and improve interfaces. I recommended strategies to optimize equipment performance and team workflow, provided technical support, and contributed to successful project completion.
